Class ShippingCenter

  • java.lang.Object
    • ShippingCenter

  • public class ShippingCenter
extends java.lang.Object
    Author:
    Elliot Lohr This class provides a blueprint for a shippingcenter node, which will only take tasks depending on the valid addresses passed in

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      private class  ShippingCenter.WorkerThread
      Thread created that holds information about AWStasks and pulls information from queue and assigns it to the correct ShippingSection

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private java.util.logging.Logger log
      Thread safe output to console
      private java.util.concurrent.ArrayBlockingQueue<AwsTask> queue
      Queue used as a buffere between nodes
      private ShippingSection[] sections
      Array of ShippingSections that the ShippingCenter can send orders to
      private java.lang.String shippingCenterId
      Shipping Center ID that will be assigned to orders that pass through the Shipping Center
      private java.lang.Thread thread 
      private java.lang.String[] validAddresses
      Array of cities that the Shipping Center will accept orders from

        Constructor for a ShippingCenter object
        Parameters:
        shippingCenterId - the ShippingCenterID that will tagged to orders that pass through
        validAddresses - array of cities that the shipping center will accept orders from

    • Method Detail

      • put

        public boolean put(AwsTask task)
        Method called by AmazonWebServer to enqeue a new delivery task
        Parameters:
        task - order sent from AmazonWebServer
        Returns:
        true if the orders city matches one of the valid cities of the shipping center, otherwise return false
